name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Staff Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing scalable, high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Ruby**, and **Go**, with extensive hands-on experience in frameworks and libraries such as **Django**, **Node.js**, and **Rails**. Demonstrated expertise in building RESTful and GraphQL APIs, implementing CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, and deploying applications on **AWS**. 

Skilled in event-driven architecture and leveraging tools like **Kafka** and **SQS** to enhance system observability. Proven track record in designing and developing AI/ML solutions, utilizing techniques that support predictive analytics and automation. Strong compliance background ensuring all solutions meet HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS standards, with a solid foundation in Domain-Driven Design and MLOps methodologies using **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Committed to delivering innovative technology solutions through motivation, teamwork, and continuous improvement.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed scalable and event-driven applications leveraging **Ruby on Rails** and **Django**, ensuring high performance in line with business objectives.
- Designed and implemented robust RESTful and **GraphQL** APIs to facilitate seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems, improving data accessibility by **30%**.
- Led CI/CD initiatives using **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, achieving a **40%** reduction in deployment times through automated testing and integration processes.
- Engineered observability frameworks to monitor system performance using tools such as **AWS CloudWatch** and **ELK Stack**, enhancing incident response time by **25%**.
- Advanced AI and ML capabilities by deploying machine learning models with **Python** libraries such as **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, resulting in a **15%** increase in prediction accuracy for critical processes.
- Architected microservices utilizing **Node.js** and **Java** for comprehensive system integration, boosting throughput under peak load conditions by **20%**.
- Collaborated on cross-functional teams to leverage **Kafka** and **AWS SQS** for message queuing, ensuring reliable and scalable data processing workflows.
- Enhanced application performance with **Domain-Driven Design** principles, leading to a more maintainable codebase and a reduction in feature development time by **10%**.
- Conducted thorough code reviews and design discussions to share knowledge and ensure adherence to best practices in **Python** and **JavaScript** development.
- Mentored junior engineers in adopting industry-standard methodologies and fostered a culture of continuous improvement and innovation within the team.

• Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (Django), improving scalability and performance to handle **9M** transactions daily.
• Engineered interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to develop sleek and responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with instant insights into over **100K** transactions and anomalies per month.
• Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication for critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
• Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from both internal and external sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, accommodating both batch and real-time processing for efficient data handling.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, achieving **95%** accuracy in identifying suspicious activities based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, supporting **30%** improved response times.

Utilized **Ruby on Rails** and **Django** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring an event-driven architecture that supports scalability and high availability across core modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered reactive features with **Kafka** and **AWS SQS** to facilitate real-time order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, enhancing customer engagement and operational efficiency.
Developed and maintained robust APIs using **GraphQL** and **RESTful** services to support responsive frontend applications built with **JavaScript**, enhancing the user experience on web and mobile platforms by providing fast data retrieval.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, achieving streamlined deployment processes and reduced release times by **30%** while ensuring code quality through automated testing and monitoring.
Leveraged **Node.js** (version **16**) and **Spring** framework for microservices architecture, enabling rapid development and maintainability of scalable applications in a distributed environment.
Integrated machine learning models with **AI** and **ML** techniques to personalize product listings using tools like **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, increasing conversion rates by **25%** based on real-time user behavior.
Employed **event-driven** architecture principles and implemented **Domain-Driven Design** strategies to manage complex domain logic effectively, ensuring a modular and sustainable codebase.
Maintained observability and monitoring through integration with tools like **prometheus** and **Grafana**, allowing proactive performance tuning and anomaly detection to improve application reliability by **40%**.
Created secure and scalable payment workflows integrated with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, adhering to PCI compliance and ensuring safe transaction handling for over **100,000** monthly transactions.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to secure user access across the platform, maintaining GDPR compliance and safeguarding user data throughout the application lifecycle.
